person.note: Su(1) Shunqin [7064] Qi's [1490] son, Yijian's [8115] grandson, Shunyuan's [1505] and Shunbin's [7065] brother, Yi's [1502] and Bi's [7340] father, Zhuan's [1497] and Xie's [1501] uncle, Chen(1) Hong's [53] father-in-law, Zheng(1) Xifu's [7183] and Du(3) Yan's [1730] son-in-law. He died in Suzhou, where he maintained a residence, but was buried in Zhenjiang, Dantu xian [where Su(1) Song [8116] migrated from Quanzhou] and also was designated as a Kaifeng person. The common ancestor of Su(1) Song and Su(1) Shunqin was Su(1) Dan [11603], a Tang zaixiang. Sichuan TZ, 122.11b; Ouyang Xiu, WJ, 31.5b-7a; Su Shunqin, WJ, 14.208-9 (wife, born Zheng, whose mother died when she was 14, father died in 1027 when she was 17, married Shunqin at age 20 in 1030 and died in 1035 at age 25); Suzhou FZ, 139.19b-20a. CBD, 5, 4343-4.

desc.label: 官中允 即乞歸 與胡瑗、蘇舜欽為友 時號吳下三賢
康定中河東地震 舜欽詣匭通疏 范仲淹薦其才 召試集賢校理 監進奏院
天聖五年舉進士第三人 歷官知制誥 蘇舜欽等以群飲遭逐 槩言預會者皆館閣名士 舉而棄之

desc.label: 太常博士宋仲達墓銘(蘇學士集14/11下)
跋蘇子美書 / 清江三孔集
時學者從事聲律 修獨以古文稱 蘇舜欽兄弟皆從之游 故一時士大夫言能文者 必曰穆參軍
